title: Naruto Ultimate Ninja Revolution 2014 DLC RePack MULTi9-DECEPT
description:
::::::::: DECEPT PRESENTS :::::::::

 
:::: Naruto Shippuden Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution DLC RePack MULTi9 ::::


::Information::


Year: 2014
Genre: Action, Fighting
Developer: CyberConnect2 Co., Ltd.
Publisher: NAMCO BANDAI Games
Publication Type: RePack
Platform: PC
Language: Russian, English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Polish, 
Brazilian, Japanese
Language: English, Japanese
Crack: enclosing (3DM) 


::Description::


REVOLUTIONARY STORM SERIES IS BACK! Last game of the series NARUTO 
SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM allows players to immerse your head 
in the wonderful world of NARUTO. 


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows XP or higher with latest Service Pack 
Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core or AMD 
Memory: 1 GB RAM 
Graphics: 512 MB video cards Pixel Shader 4.0 (Geforce 8xxx-ATI HD2xxx) 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 8 GB available space


::RePack Features::


It is based on licensed content! - Do not cut

- Do not recoded
- Archives of the game are not affected!
- Game Version 1.0
- Installation time: ~ 10 min | depends on the capacity of the computer 
- DLC Included:-
* Samurai Armor Pack
* Naruto / Sasuke / Itachi (Apron) Pack
* Summer Cloth Pack 
# Author RePack: [DECEPT / Decepticon]


::Release Notes::


OK friends its been a long time since we have release a big game and this

one was not the greatest but as a Pirate we do it for our fans, our friend 

DECEPT did hard work and give his time so we needed to get this repack to 

our fans for his dedication, not the best game but will try to give you guys 

the best game repacks as they come along, Peace out. 


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT GOES to DECEPTION for RePacking and Distribution.
